Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Very lovely small scarab with all the details engraved (head, clypeus, prothorax, elytra and legs).  The reverse bears the following finely incised prophylactic signs : Ankh ("life") and neb ("lord, all, every").
